pages.text: $(item)物流設定器/$的主要用途是幫助設定$(l:logistics/overview)物流系統/$。$(p)使用物流設定器$(thing)右擊/$$(l:logistics/frames)物流框架/$以設定其過濾。$(p)使用物流設定器$(thing)潛行右擊/$物流框架以將其移除。

The $(item)Logistics Configurator/$ can also be used to remove (by $(thing)Sneak right-clicking/$) other attachable gadgets, such as the $(l:semiblocks/transfer_gadget)Transfer Gadget/$ and the $(l:semiblocks/crop_support)Crop Support/$.
